location-applied.legend: Where did you make your application?

nationality.label: Country of nationality.
nationality.hint: Start typing your nationality to create a short list of options. Then press up or down to navigate between options.

use-address.label: I want to be contacted by post

last-name-error.label: What is your correct family name?
last-name-error.title: This is the first line under 'name' on your BRP.
last-name-error.hint: Due to limitations, we can only print the first 30 characters of your Family Name on your BRP. This is not an error and you will be able to use your BRP.

first-name-error.label: What are your correct given name(s)?
first-name-error.title: This is the second line under 'name' on your BRP.
first-name-error.hint: Due to limitations, we can only print the first 30 characters of your Given Name(s) on your BRP. This is not an error and you will be able to use your BRP.

birth-place-error.label: What is your correct place of birth?
birth-place-error.hint: Due to limitations, we can only print the first 16 characters of your Place of Birth on your BRP. This is not an error and you will be able to use your BRP.

date-of-birth-error.label: What is your correct date of birth?

sponsor-details-error.title: This is the third line under 'remarks' on your BRP. This is the reference number of your employer, university or college.
sponsor-details-error.label: What is the correct sponsor reference number?

nationality-error.label: What is your correct nationality?.
nationality-error.hint: Start typing your nationality to create a short list of options. Then press up or down to navigate between options.

signature-error.label: What is wrong with your signature?

photograph-error.label: What is wrong with your photograph?

national-insurance-error.label: What is your correct National Insurance number?

length-of-stay-error.label: Describe the problem
length-of-stay-error.hint: You do not need to report an error if your BRP expires on 31 December 2024 but your immigration status allows you to stay longer. You will not need a BRP from 1 January 2025. Youâ€™ll be able to prove your immigration status online, without a BRP. UKVI will update their information on how to prove your immigration status in early 2024. You do not need to do anything and your immigration status will not be affected.
